sqlMap.select:
/* csp.oep.service.impl.CSPOEP018EServiceImpl.CSPOEP018EMainSelect */
SELECT rownum AS NUM ,SNO ,MSG_DVSN_CD ,MSG_TXT ,SEND_CNB ,TO_CHAR(MSG_OM_DH,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MSG_OM_DT FROM ( SELECT SNO ,MSG_DVSN_CD ,MSG_TXT ,SEND_CNB ,MSG_OM_DH FROM TBCSPOEP008H WHERE MSG_DVSN_CD IN ('03','04') ORDER BY SNO DESC ) WHERE rownum < 11
